alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN IBERIA AND SOUTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE PARISHES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coteau, or 8 miles west of New Iberia, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Broussard, Youngsville, Delcambre, Cade, Coteau, Acadiana Regional Airport, and Jefferson Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper Vermilion
